Epoch1.note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch1' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/dscovr/h0/mag/2015/dscovr_h0_mag_20150608_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 1000 [ms] = PT1S, occurred for all 86399 timesteps.

Counts based on variable 'Epoch1' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/dscovr/h0/mag/2025/dscovr_h0_mag_20250324_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 1000 [ms] = PT1S, occurred for all 86399 timesteps.
